resources.string:
"The update process will take approximately 3-5 minutes and require 15% or higher battery life.
Please make sure the battery life is higher than 15% before updating.
Do you want to update your Modem Firmware now?"

"DO NOT shut down the device in updating.
Any unexpected interruption would cause the irreversible damage.
Do you want to update your Modem Firmware now?"

"The process would require 15% or higher Battery life.
Please make sure the battery life is higher than 15% before start updating."
